title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.6 - Minutes of meetings of boards and committees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.6 - Minutes of meetings of boards and committees

State Regulations

Each video lottery gaming agent licensee or applicant
thereof shall file with the commission copies of the minutes of all meetings of
such licensee or applicant's board of directors, members or partnership
executive committee, as applicable, and of all committee meetings including, without limitation, the audit committee, within seven days of their formal
adoption. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5114.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
